item.title: Wait, Who Is The Doctor In Kraven Behind Chameleon's Powers & Is It A Secret Sinister Six Reference?
item.description: Kraven the Hunter shook up the SSU with several new villains to expand the universe, but the question remains who was helping these villains?

item.description: The shape of the DCU is only beginning to come together, although the release of Creature Commandos has clearly differentiated it from the MCU.

item.title: Ryan Reynolds Comments On Deadpool & Wolverine Sequel Chances
item.description: After Deadpool & Wolverine became a smash hit, everyone wants to see more of Marvel's new dynamic duo, Deadpool actor Ryan Reynolds included.
